text: Lewine yi gbeti kankiraan xalima waxatin naxan yi, alogo mangana walikɛne xa a kui to xa gbeti gbegbe a kui, mangana sɛbɛli tiin nun saraxaraline kuntigina walikɛɛn bundɔxɔn yi fama nɛn, e fa gbeti kankiraan kui ba, e mɔn yi a tongo e xɛtɛ a ra a funfuni. E yi fɛriɲɛnma gbetin nasuxɛ na kii nin lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ.
